tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_activity_trn_texts; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_activity_trn_texts AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id,
CASE aav.governmentapprovalprocedures WHEN true THEN 2 WHEN false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS governmentapprovalprocedures_id, CASE aav.governmentapprovalprocedures WHEN true THEN 'Yes' WHEN false THEN 'No' ELSE 'Undefined' END AS governmentapprovalprocedures_text,
CASE aav.jointcriteria WHEN true THEN 2 WHEN false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS jointcriteria_id, CASE aav.jointcriteria WHEN true THEN 'Yes' WHEN false THEN 'No' ELSE 'Undefined' END AS jointcriteria_text,
CASE WHEN (aav.indirect_on_budget) THEN 'Indirect On Budget' ELSE '' END AS iob_text, CASE WHEN (aav.indirect_on_budget) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS iob_id
FROM amp_activity_version aav;
